otherNames: Male Graduation, Graduation M, Graduation M: Our Carnival, Sotsugyou M: Ore-tachi no Carnival, 卒業M ～オレ達のカーニバル～
synopsis: Kato, Shimura, Arai, Nakamoto, and Takagi are friends at an all-boys boarding school. After they get tricked by their school government president, the five must put on a performance of the play "Little Women."
